name: Daunting Shadows
description:
In the depths of light lurks shadows. In this game you will shoot shadow slugs to try and save your light! Get hit three times and you're out! Good luck getting new high scores!

(Note restart the game every time as there is a bug that makes it so that the enemy spawners are not reset. This may make it very difficult to play. I will be updating this game throughout the week fixing this issue. It is still playable if you don't restart but can become very challenging)

Upcoming Updates:

- Light Bar (When you miss an enemy your light bar decreases) adds more challenge to the game

- Bug Fixes

- (Maybe) A level system

-Options Menu being functional

Hello, my name is Michael and I am a brand new game developer! This is my first completed game as an entry for the Lux Game Jam. I hope to learn more by participating in more Jams and eventually hope to make a successful Indie Game.

Feel free to leave me feedback in a comment or on Instagram.

Instagram: @GarnetDevLogs
